description: Born and raised in Mumbai, India, Chef Rahul Patel is a spice master and culinary innovator. He hails from a family of street food vendors and learned the art of balancing flavors from his grandfather, a renowned street food chef. With his passion for creating unique fusion dishes, Rahul has gained international recognition for his bold flavor profiles and commitment to using only the freshest ingredients.
image: A photo of Chef Patel standing in front of his Mumbai-based street food stall, with a steaming hot plate of his signature 'Patel's Perfect Pani Puri' visible on the counter.
